rules

Class BoardRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • rules.BoardRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BoardRules
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains the rules and constraints required for items to be inserted into a routing board
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        a int.

      • trace_widths_are_layer_dependent

        public boolean trace_widths_are_layer_dependent(int p_net_no)
        Returns true, if the trace widths used for routing for the input net are equal on all layers. If p_net_no < 0, the default trace widths for all nets are checked.
        Parameters:
        p_net_no - a int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • create_default_via_rule

        public void create_default_via_rule(NetClass p_net_class,
                                    java.lang.String p_name)
        Create a default via rule for p_net_class with name p_name. If more than one via infos with the same layer range are found, only the via info with the smmallest pad size is inserted.
        Parameters:
        p_net_class - a NetClass object.
        p_name - a String object.

      • append_net_class

        public NetClass append_net_class(java.lang.String p_name)
        Appends a new net class initialized with default data and returns that class. If a class with p_name exists, this class is returned withoout appending a new class.
        Parameters:
        p_name - a String object.
        Returns:
        a NetClass object.

                                      int p_to_no,
                                      java.util.Collection<Item> p_board_items)
        Changes the clearance class index of all objects on the board with index p_from_no to p_to_no.
        Parameters:
        p_from_no - a int.
        p_to_no - a int.
        p_board_items - a Collection object.

      • remove_clearance_class

        public boolean remove_clearance_class(int p_index,
                                      java.util.Collection<Item> p_board_items)
        Removes the clearance class with number p_index. Returns false, if that was not possible, because there were still items assigned to this class.
        Parameters:
        p_index - a int.
        p_board_items - a Collection object.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • get_pin_edge_to_turn_dist

        public double get_pin_edge_to_turn_dist()
        Returns the minimum distance between the pin border and the next corner of a connected trace por a pin with connection restrictions. If the result is <= 0, there are no exit restrictions.
        Returns:
        a double.

      • set_pin_edge_to_turn_dist

        public void set_pin_edge_to_turn_dist(double p_value)
        Sets he minimum distance between the pin border and the next corner of a connected trace por a pin with connection restrictions. if p_value is <= 0, there are no exit restrictions.
        Parameters:
        p_value - a double.

      • set_ignore_conduction

        public void set_ignore_conduction(boolean p_value)
        Tells the router, if conduction areas should be ignored..
        Parameters:
        p_value - a boolean.

      • get_ignore_conduction

        public boolean get_ignore_conduction()
        If true, the router ignores conduction areas.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • get_trace_angle_restriction

        public AngleRestriction get_trace_angle_restriction()
        The angle restriction for tracese: 90 degree, 45 degree or none.
        Returns:
        a AngleRestriction object.

      • set_trace_angle_restriction

        public void set_trace_angle_restriction(AngleRestriction p_angle_restriction)
        Sets the angle restriction for tracese: 90 degree, 45 degree or none.
        Parameters:
        p_angle_restriction - a AngleRestriction object.

      • set_slow_autoroute_algorithm

        public void set_slow_autoroute_algorithm(boolean p_value)
        If true, shapes of type Simplex are always used in the autorouter algorithm. If false, shapes of type IntBox are used in 90 degree autorouting and shapes of type IntOctagon are used in 45 degree autorouting.
        Parameters:
        p_value - a boolean.

      • get_slow_autoroute_algorithm

        public boolean get_slow_autoroute_algorithm()
        If true, shapes of type Simplex are always used in the autorouter algorithm. If false, shapes of type IntBox are used in 90 degree autorouting and shapes of type IntOctagon are used in 45 degree autorouting.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • get_default_via_diameter

        public double get_default_via_diameter()
        Returns the Maximum of the diameter of the default via on its first and last layer.
        Returns:
        a double.
